attributes.review: I am an american citizen that is just trying to see both sides. I am so thrown back by the quality of this app. It is extremely slow and they force you to enter your phone number in without any option to continue without. Once you do sign up, you are going to be bothered by many many messages about the campaign. I’m disgusted that just because you want to get educated about both sides, you are forced to be apart of his algorithm. NOT WORTH IT!!!!
attributes.title: Unsatisfied.

attributes.review:
So I decided that I wouldn’t let people constantly telling me trump was HORRIBLE dictate my support for him , but this app ?! Was the last straw it’s constantly giving me viruses and interrupting my Netflix 0/5 would not recommend. 
Sincerely,Karen

This app is ridiculous. As SOON as you download it, it wants your phone number. I can’t just be giving my phone number out to random apps. That’s the epitome of “stranger danger”. Plus I don’t even have a chance to see if I like the so before it asks for my personal info. Weird. Creepy.
attributes.title: Unacceptable

attributes.review: this app located my exact location and within 24 hrs of downloading the app, my whole family was being deported. we’re all born in amerikkka, so the fact that they got deported was very confusing to me. if i could, i would rate ZERO stars!!!!!! BRING ME MY FAMILY BACK!!!!!
